scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:css: echo 'stylelint baseline not configured for legacy stylesheet; skipping'
scripts.qa: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run check:placeholders && npm run check:origin-redirects && npm run audit:images && npm run check:redirects-cloudflare && npm run check:extensionless-links && npm run check:navigation-sim && npm run qa:server-checks
scripts.qa:server-checks: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; if [ -x node_modules/.bin/wrangler ]; then WRANGLER=node_modules/.bin/wrangler; WRANGLER_ARGS="pages dev . --port 8788"; else WRANGLER=npx; WRANGLER_ARGS="--yes wrangler@4.64.0 pages dev . --port 8788"; fi; bash -lc "$WRANGLER $WRANGLER_ARGS" >/tmp/wrangler-pages-dev.log 2>&1 & SERVER_PID=$!; trap "kill $SERVER_PID 2>/dev/null || true" EXIT; npx wait-on http://127.0.0.1:8788; npm run audit:a11y && npm run audit:lighthouse'
scripts.audit:lighthouse:pages: scripts/with-chrome-path.sh bash -lc "mkdir -p reports && npx lighthouse http://127.0.0.1:8788 --only-categories=performance,seo,accessibility,best-practices --output=json --output-path=reports/lh-pages.json --chrome-flags='--headless=new --no-sandbox'"
scripts.cf:deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy . --project-name=toptier-electrical
